strapiPost.title: The Blessings Collegiate Invitational Tees Off Today
strapiPost.content:
The Blessings Collegiate Invitational begins today, giving players from 11 of the top men’s and women’s golf programs from around the country the opportunity to shine on a global stage and displaying the region’s world-class amenities. 

  • Let’s go Hogs: Last year, the hosting Razorback Golf Program captured all six tournament titles, and is ready to deliver another amazing performance this year for the third annual tournament at the Blessings Golf Club.
  • Welcome to NWA: Presented by Tyson Foods, all three days of official tournament play will be broadcast on Golf Channel Oct 3-5, making NW Arkansas the center of the collegiate golf world for the week.

Read more on the tournament HERE.
